itemInfo.itemDesc: A ring decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Coastal Cave, Coastal Cliff, Northern Heidel Quarry, Southern Cienaga, Hexe Stone Wall, and Abandoned Iron Mine. It can be directly obtained from Ore containing Iron.

item.name: Rough Topaz
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Topaz Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Resplendent Topaz Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Resplendent Topaz.
